p: The bioactive compounds present in fruit bio-residues and by-products are extensively applied to food formulations to provide or enhance nutritional, sensory, and functional properties [ 164]. The application of these bioactive compounds can be direct, by applying the active compound to the food itself, or indirect, by applying these compounds, for example, in active food packaging [ 3]. The real-time quality evaluation of perishable products like fish, meat, fruits and vegetables, milk, and dairy products, is in great demand, particularly by developing intelligent packaging systems [ 165]. Thus, it is essential to innovate effective food quality indicators [ 32].
